alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 9:20PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of northern Lake, southeastern Lincoln, northern Sanders and west central Flathead Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 919 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from near Columbia Falls to near Kalispell to 15 miles west of Big Arm. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kalispell, Evergreen, Whitefish, Columbia Falls, Woods Bay, Bigfork, Somers, Kila, Martin City, Coram, Lakeside, Creston, Hungry Horse, Marion and La Salle. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 77 and 150. Highway 83 between mile markers 76 and 90. Highway 93 N between mile markers 94 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
